re_checking.description: Verification of marks calculation in the answer book
steps: Checker calculates the total marks awarded in the answer book
Checker verifies marks allotted to each answer inside the answer book
Checker confirms marks are correctly carried forward to the front page
Checker verifies the final calculation on the front page

re_assessment.description: Full re-evaluation of the answer book by a different examiner
steps: Re-assessment always starts with re-checking (marks calculation) first
If marks improve in re-checking, re-assessment is stopped and new marks are awarded to the student
If no improvement in re-checking, full re-assessment is carried out
The examiner for re-assessment must be different from the original examiner
Student identity and original marks are hidden from the new examiner before re-assessment
If the difference between re-assessment marks and original marks is less than 9% of maximum marks — no second re-assessment and no change in marks
If the difference is more than 9% of maximum marks — a second re-assessment is done and the result nearer to the original marks is declared as final

rules: Re-checking and Re-assessment is only for End Semester Exam Theory subjects

Fee once paid will not be refunded under any circumstance
